label: Pin Badges and Buttons
description: Market category for custom and pre-made pin badges and buttons.

subcategories.label: Charity and Cause Pins
subcategories.description: Pin badges that support a specific charity or cause.

subcategories.description: Customizable pin badges and buttons for personal or business use.

subcategories.label: Collectible Pins
subcategories.description: Unique and rare pin badges for collectors.

subcategories.description: Fashion accessories in the form of pins and brooches.

subcategories.label: Button Making Supplies
subcategories.description: Supplies for making custom buttons and badges.
